meeting_info.organization: TOD TIF District Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development
Angela Hardiman, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Call to order and introduction of meeting participants
Public comments pertaining to agenda items 3 through 4
Review and consideration of the Meeting Record of the December 5, 2023 TOD TIF District Board Meeting
agenda_items.presenter: Sue Hounsel, District Manager, Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consideration of a development agreement with UCR Development Services LLC and/or its affiliates
agenda_items.description: In an amount not to exceed $1,778,000, payable from current and future TOD TIF District funds, in consideration of the Lancaster-Corning Retail Development ('Project') on property currently addressed as 3011-3039 S. Lancaster Road.
agenda_items.presenter: Angela Hardiman, District Manager, Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approval and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council
